bioconda.name: bioconductor-cghcall
bioconda.summary: Calling aberrations for array CGH tumor profiles.

biotools.summary: Calls aberrations for array CGH data using a six state mixture model as well as several biological concepts that are ignored by existing algorithms. Visualization of profiles is also provided.

bioschemas.name: CGHcall
bioschemas.summary: Calls aberrations for array CGH data using a six state mixture model as well as several biological concepts that are ignored by existing algorithms. Visualization of profiles is also provided.
